summary: "Aliens," released in 1986, is a sci-fi action movie by James Cameron, following the 1979 film "Alien." Sigourney Weaver returns as Ellen Ripley, who joins Colonial Marines to investigate a lost human colony where she first met the aliens. Despite production challenges, the film was a hit, earning praise for its action and Weaver's performance. It made a lot of money and is now seen as one of the best sci-fi and action films, with great special effects and a strong story. The film led to more "Alien" sequels and lots of merchandise.
title: Aliens (film)
